directions: Roast bell pepper and jalapeno over a gas flame, turning often, until skin is blistered and charred all over, 5–10 minutes. (Alternatively, broil on a rimmed baking sheet.) Transfer to a medium bowl and cover with plastic wrap; let steam 10 minutes.

Peel and seed peppers, then finely chop. Mix mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne, and paprika in a medium bowl. Fold in cheddar and chopped peppers; season with salt and black pepper. Spread on ciabatta and slice crosswise into pieces. Serve with pickles.
Pimiento cheese can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
ingredients: 1 ciabatta loaf, halved lengthwise, lightly toasted
title: Roasted-Jalapeno Pimiento Cheese Toasts
